sourcesContent:
import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import style from './SideBar.module.scss' export default function SideBar({isOpen,setIsOpen}) { const {cart}=useSelector(state=>state.cart) const close = () => { setIsOpen(false); }; return ( <>
Shopping Cart 0
{cart.map((item) => ( <>
{item.name}
- {item.quantity} +
{item.price} $
))}
) }
